title: Diamond Chandbali Pendant - "Jyotsna Haar"
materials: G Color). Finished with Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This exquisite pendant features a contemporary Chandbali (crescent moon) design, meticulously set with sparkling brilliant-cut diamonds. The piece showcases a three-tiered structure, reminiscent of traditional South Indian 'Addigai' necklaces but with a modern flair. The topmost tier displays a delicate row of leaf motifs, representing growth and prosperity.
occasions: or as a statement piece for special occasions. Also suitable for pre-wedding ceremonies like the Sangeet or Mehendi.
description: This 'Jyotsna Haar' beautifully blends traditional South Indian design sensibilities with a modern aesthetic. The rose gold setting enhances the brilliance of the diamonds, creating a dazzling effect. Its lightweight design ensures comfortable wear, while the intricate detailing reflects superior craftsmanship. A timeless piece that elevates any ensemble.
